changelog:
- Kernel Updated Derp 5.0
- Build with clang 9.0.1
- Android-9.0.0_R34 (March security patch)
- Updated Lawnchair to latest a-943
- Introduce Suspend Actions
- Added Supsend Action Tile
- Added deep sleep info to uptime 
- New default wallpapers
- Fix adb being disabled after reboot
- Added navbar layout inversion tuning
- Fixed Spotify crashes
- Added screen off animations
- Added Random system animations
- Added ability to hide lockscreen items
- Introduce lockscreen clock/date styles
- Fixed battery incorrect percents position
- Added new PoorMan Themes: \"Violator\", \"Teal Meal\"
- Random PoorMan theming fixes
- Fixed compact navbar layout placing of rotate button
- Added more lockscreen clock styles
- Added Pixel Navbar animation toggle
- Disable multicolor Battery Led
- Switch to CAF WLAN
- Improve stability and performance
- Another small fixes and tweaks
